https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qKWYgHJPtdV9Mv64aMySqcqWlqY.jpg Beginning and ending with the endless promises of Mexican politicians, Barrio 13 is a film based on the daily life of many Mexicans and Central Americans who struggle with the current realities: poverty, despair, misery and political betrayal.
